meanings.definition: A malignant tumor derived from fibrous connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctors diagnosed the patient with fibrosarcomas after the biopsy results came back.
meanings.sent2: The research study focused on the treatment options available for fibrosarcomas.
meanings.sent3: Despite their scary name, fibrosarcomas are no match for the superhero immune system.
meanings.sent4: The spread of fibrosarcomas in the body was compared to a wildfire, growing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The image of fibrosarcomas invading the healthy tissue was etched in the doctor's mind.

meanings.sent1: The hospital reported multiple cases of fibrosarcomas in the oncology ward.
meanings.sent2: The textbooks discussed the differences in treatment between fibrosarcomas and other tumors.
meanings.sent3: The shelves were filled with jars containing fibrosarcomas, part of the medical exhibit.
meanings.sent4: In the field of oncology, fibrosarcomas stood out like bright stars in the night sky.
